description: The Shadow Insulated pants will keep your legs cozy and comfortable all winter long. Layer them under shell pants and bibs for cold-temp skiing, snowboarding and alpine climbing. Warmth, comfort and performance are assured with stretchy, breathable and weather resistant fabric, 45g VerticalX ECO SR insulation and dialed features including a super stretch ankle cuff that adapts for use with any winter footwear.
name: Outdoor Research Shadow Insulated Pants - Mens
